articles.author: Robert Reich
articles.title: The US should break up monopolies – not punish working Americans for rising prices - The Guardian
articles.description: The Fed is putting people out of work to reduce workers’ bargaining power and reduce inflation. They’ve got it all wrong
articles.content:
Job growth and wages are slowing. Employers added 223,000 jobs in December, the labor department reported on Friday lower than the average in recent months.
Average hourly wages rose by 4.6% in Dece… [+4719 chars]

articles.title: Prince Harry explains why he refers to William as 'arch-nemesis' in new book - CNN
articles.description: Prince Harry tells Good Morning America's Michael Strahan why he refers to his brother, Prince William, as his "arch-nemesis" in his new book.
